services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
For 25 years, Canlik has been the premier Kitchen Refacing Specialist in Greater Toronto Area. It's kitchen upgrade solutions are custom to fit individual family needs, New Kitchens or Refacing Kitchens, they are more personal, flexible, affordable and environmental friendly. Since 1990, Canlik’s principal has been the same – delivering high quality products and services. No pushy sales. Consultants focus on providing honest and unbiased suggestions so that home owners can make the right decisions. Kitchen projects can be overwhelming and confusing – but it does not have to be if customers chose Canlik Kitchens. 
 
Details on our solutions: - 
 
(A) Kitchen Refacing,
Canlik’s very popular "Premier Kitchen Refacing” aims at delivering custom kitchen looks with fraction of the cost. It uses the existing infrastructure and replaces exterior elements, like the cabinet doors, gable and fillers. It reduces wastage and helps avoid hidden costs. Kitchen Refacing solution has been providing great alternatives for those who want to achieve their renovation goals with less effort, less risk and have their budget under control.
 
(B) Custom New Kitchens 
“Canlik Custom Kitchens” allow home owners fully utilize limited spaces because cabinets are custom built to fit spaces. It can handle challenging space issues that "Modular kitchens" can hardly address. It also makes preserving the existing layouts and the foot prints possible, so that the flooring and other elements are not affected. Storage efficiency is achieved by detail oriented cabinet configurations design and adding effective accessories, if necessary.

profile:
Marble Granite Countertops Inc. (MGC Inc.) has the capabilities to meet your aesthetic and design needs. Our assets lie in more than 15 years of experience and skills which our staff brings to the table, resulting in a high quality product delivered on time. We work with designers, architects and home builders to accommodate residential and commercial applications. We also specialize in working with a variety of stones such as Granite, Marble, Limestone, Quartz, Slate and more.
 
Our fabrication facility has all the tools and equipment required to guarantee a product of excellent quality and during fabrication quality control measures are in place to ensure that anything that leaves our facility has been thoroughly reviewed by a full time on-site supervisor. Whether your project is a kitchen counter-top, vanity, tub surrounding, fire place, or custom piece, our goal is to ensure 100% satisfaction on any finished product.

profile:
Brandom Kitchens and Bath Design Center has grown into a trusted brand from humble beginnings in March, 1989. What began as a small rental unit on Bloor St. in Oshawa, has grown in size and tenure to the 9,000 sq ft warehouse we design from today. Our guests and repeat clients enjoy being greeted by Cheryl or Tony, before strolling through our showroom with a refreshment to gain inspiration from our many displays showcasing new products from the countries leading suppliers. Brandom takes great pride in offering a beginning-to-end approach as a team. Our clients will never find themselves shopping sections of department stores or sourcing tradespeople. Our experience has gained the confidence of many, and results in productivity while honouring our clients schedule and budget. We enjoy every step of the renovation process, from measuring and designing the space, to installing the cabinets, flooring, reworking plumbing, safely updating electrical needs, and as needed will remove walls, counters, backsplash, and dispose of all accumulated excess.

DIY's can be enticing but renovations by inexperienced contractors or labourers can quickly become expensive and stressful. 

Once a client has agreed to partner with us, our design team will present a 3D render of the discussed vision to be approved or amended, before any work commences in your home. We bring more than fifty years of aggregate experience ensuring an enjoyable, creative experience transforming their favourite space. 
In addition to primary design, our team is present for our clients during all facets of the installation, manufacturing processes and future service. 

Our team wouldn't be complete without our in-house installers who bring the design element to life with precision and care. Our installers consistently deliver excellence while showing the utmost care for remaining flooring and furniture. Installers are available upon request to revisit the site for services if needed. (All electrical and plumbing work is performed to code standards).

We are grateful for every new and returning client for making Brandom Durham's trusted design studio.

Call Cheryl today to schedule your first appointment. Our family is looking forward to working with yours!


SERVICES INCLUDE:

-design & install cabinets
-supply & install countertops
-supply & install backsplash
-supply & install flooring
-supply all plumbing needs for your project
-use certified electricians for your project
-wall removals when necessary
-remove all associated garbage
hours: Mon. - Thurs. 9-5, Fri. 9-4, Sat. 10-4, Sun. Closed

profile:
We are a manufacturer of all cabinetry components including kitchens, vanities, wall units, laundry etc.  We provide a free design/measure consultation.  We provide a full kitchen renovation service including wall removal, beam installation, flooring, lighting, trim, etc.  We have a designer on staff as well as in-house cabinetry installers and tradespeople.  
All of our cabinetry comes put together and you are welcome to purchase for your own installation or have us install it for you.  We are able to provide any door finish in any style of door as well as custom trim work, hood vents, floating shelves etc. We can supply all types of countertops including laminate, quartz, granite and butcher block.  Please give us a call to arrange your free consultation or to send drawings to us to provide a quote.
name: Canadian Cabinetry & Countertops

profile: RIGHT CHOICE RENOS was founded on the principles of providing honest, reliable and ethical work at a fair price specializing in Home Renovation and Electrical work. Sean D'Aguiar has over 15 years experience with dealing with various trades. Brad Emmons,owner of EMMONS ELECTRIC is a Master Electrician and ACP certified who has over 20 years experience in the industry. Together we have a combined knowledge and appreciation of the overall process and requirements to get the project completed in a time efficient manner. We understand that renovation projects can be a stressful process. We treat every project as though it is our own and hope to provide the most pleasurable experience to every customer.
services:
ACCESSIBILITY 
From design to implementation we can build accessibility ramps, decks bathrooms and more. 

BASEMENT RENOVATIONS
From start to finish we take care of the planning, demolition, wall construction, electrical work, insulation, soundproofing ceiling, drywall, door installation, new floors, painting and much more.
Separate entrance-way, In-law suites, Bedrooms, Kitchens, Playrooms, Bathrooms, Laundry Rooms and More.

CEILINGS
Upgrading your home with ceiling renovations is a surefire way of improving the quality and value of your home and will give it a new modern look. We offer installation of drop ceilings, smooth ceilings, pot-lights, coffered ceilings and more. 

DECKS
Whether you are looking to repair/refinish an existing deck or to build your dream deck we can take care of it all. From design and planning to reality.  We offer flat decks, raised decks, multi-level decks, stairways and accessible ramps and more.

DEMOLITION/CONSTRUCTION CLEANUP
As part of any renovation project demolition is always one of the first steps. we take care of all demolition and garbage removal associated.

DRYWALLING
Complete repair and refinish of existing and new drywall on walls and ceilings.

ELETRICAL
We offer fully licensed services which include complete re-wiring of existing service, knob & tube removal, aluminum wiring, trouble shooting & repairs, radiant floor heat, lighting, pool and spa Hook-ups, Panel & Service upgrades, layout and design. 

FLOORING
We can take care of all your flooring needs; from the subfloor to the installation  of carpet, tile floors, laminate or vinyl

GARAGE AND SHED CONSTRUCTION  
Need some additional storage or need some power installed? We can help by adding or upgrading an electrical service,  shelving, repairs to existing building to design and build of your new garbage, storage shed, pool house or workshop.

GARAGE DOORS
Looking to add extra space or replace that old door; We offer full Garage Builds, Door openers, Garage door upgrades, capping, interior access doors, removal and installation.

GENERAL CONTRACTING
We manage all aspects of the project from start to finish which include; design and planning, drawings, permits and inspections.

HANDYMAN SERVICES
From minor repairs to your full renovation projects, we can help with it all.  

HVAC 
Fully licensed to supply and install new furnace upgrades, fireplaces, air-conditioners, hot water tanks and on demand hot water units. 

KITCHEN RENOVATIONS
Kitchens are the heart of the home, a gathering place for family and friends to cook, eat and entertain. We provide full kitchen remodeling to simply updating your existing kitchen. We can help with the installation of cabinet lighting, new floors, pot lights or even a back-splash. 

PAINTING
We provide services for painting which include; ceilings, interior and exterior walls (brick,wood and aluminum siding), decks, sheds, fences and more.
name: Right Choice Renos Inc.

profile:
*During the unprecedented time we are happy to offer Zoom and Facetime consultations, or in person with mask and social distancing. We are following all CDC guidelines. Your health is our priority !*

 At Built to Last Contracting we believe in simplicity.  We handle all aspects of your project from inception to design. We understand that a renovation can be immensely stressful, and we are here to make sure that is not the case! When you select us for your project, all you have to do is envision the changes you want made to your space and then let us handle the rest. We do full home and commercial renovation but specialize in Custom Kitchens, Basements and Bathrooms. Full 3D design rendering drawings available to envision your dream space before we make it your reality!  We are covered under WSIB and 2 Million liability insurance. We aim to make your renovation process as seamless as possible.
licenses: We sub-contract to a licensed Electrician, Plumber, Architect and HVAC technician.

profile:
East Pro Contracting Group offers commercial and residential services in the east GTA and surrounding areas. 

With over 15 years of experience renovating kitchens, bathrooms, basements, offices and more, we provide all the necessary resources to assist with preparing creative designs as well as managing and completing your project on budget, on time and with the highest level of quality workmanship. 

Whether we are drawing inspiration from modern trends, finding unique solutions to renovation challenges or simply creating a space that showcases your true colours, we can help to customize a plan and create a budget for your next project!

Service areas include (but not necessarily limited to) Scarborough, East York, North York, Markham, Stouffville, Claremont, Uxbridge, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Courtice, Bowmanville.
services: Commercial and Residential remodels and general renovations
brands: vary depending on client preference and project details
specialities:
Whole home renovations, including Kitchens, Bathrooms and Basement projects. 
Commercial repairs and renovation services available as well.
